toolitp.last_approved_text: Also selects the next entity while in cinematic mode.

shortcut_localisation.toolitp: Also selects the next entity while in cinematic mode.

onscreen.last_approved_text: You can cancel giving an order/drag move before releasing the mouse button, by pressing escape or pressing the alternate mouse button.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: You can cancel giving an order/drag move before releasing the mouse button, by pressing escape or pressing the alternate mouse button.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold CTRL and double left-click on a unit to select all units of that type.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold CTRL and double left-click on a unit to select all units of that type.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold CTRL while giving a drag order to make the selected unit(s) walk to the destination.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold CTRL while giving a drag order to make the selected unit(s) walk to the destination.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold LALT while right-click dragging to drag selection in direction pulled, while maintaining their dimensions.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold LALT while right-click dragging to drag selection in direction pulled, while maintaining their dimensions.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold RALT while right-click dragging to drag selection, using point clicked as centre front for drag-out.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold RALT while right-click dragging to drag selection, using point clicked as centre front for drag-out.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Holding ALT, you can left-click drag your selection to tweak their location while maintaining their relative positioning. Hold CTRL while doing so to rotate the selection.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Holding ALT, you can left-click drag your selection to tweak their location while maintaining their relative positioning. Hold CTRL while doing so to rotate the selection.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Holding ALT as artillery will enter manual-aiming mode, allowing you to select an area on which to fire.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Holding ALT as artillery will enter manual-aiming mode, allowing you to select an area on which to fire.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Holding ALT and right-clicking on an enemy unit will force a melee attack while not in melee mode.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Holding ALT and right-clicking on an enemy unit will force a melee attack while not in melee mode.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold SHIFT and right-click drag to draw a movement path for your selection to follow.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold SHIFT and right-click drag to draw a movement path for your selection to follow.

onscreen.last_approved_text: Hold SHIFT while selecting units on the battlefield to select all units between previous selection and newest selection. This is useful for selecting long lines of units.

shortcut_localisation.onscreen: Hold SHIFT while selecting units on the battlefield to select all units between previous selection and newest selection. This is useful for selecting long lines of units.

toolitp.last_approved_text: Also selects the previous entity while in cinematic mode.

shortcut_localisation.toolitp: Also selects the previous entity while in cinematic mode.
